teaser: You may have seen TV ads talking about the Internet of everything -- a network of smart devices, from your car to your kitchen, that you can easily control or even program. Turn down the AC at home from your desk at work, for instance. But as the web of Internet-connected devices expands, so do the security risks.
title: Marketplace Tech for Tuesday, July 30, 2013
